But when he first met her, he was incredibly nice to her…?\n\n\"My husband just grabbed his wife's hand and he was already screaming.\"\n\nLydia learns little by little about Chillia's secret in the admiral's intense love. Dragons, giant octopuses, sea snakes, fairies and mermaids… A destined love after marriage on the splendid ocean!\n\n**\n\n\"I know a plant that can help my husband increase his stamina.\"\n\nAlexander leaned over and whispered in her ear, \"If you weren't satisfied last night, I'll try to find it.\"\n\n\"…Oh no!\" Last night! Lydia literally blushed as she recalled her secrets that she couldn’t tell anyone.\n\n---\nThey call her a monster... but to this admiral, she's a sacred descendant of the sea! Rudia Flang has been mistreated her whole life, so when the emperor arranges her marriage to Alexander Cilia, war hero and the youngest admiral in history, she cowers in fear at the thought of marrying a violent seaman. As this ocean voyage treks on, she's met with benevolence from the Sercilian Island people who, unbeknownst to her, find the scales glistening on her body far from the marking of a monster...\n\n---\n[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58318624)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-admirals-monstrous-wife/info)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/97119)","fr":"Lydia Plang a été appelée un monstre à cause de ses écailles. C'est un amiral de Chilia, dont on dit qu'il est atroce.\n\nMais il la rencontre pour la première fois et se montre étonnamment gentil avec elle...?\n\n\"Le mari a juste tenu la main de sa femme et cela l'a fait crier.\"\n\nLydia apprend peu à peu le secret de Chilia dans l'amour intense de l'amiral.\n\nDragons, krakens, serpents de mer, nymphes et sirènes, amour fatidique après le pré-mariage dans la belle mer! Only 10 times.\"\n\n“There's a concert that I really want to go to, so let me stay over.”\n\nThat is what childhood friend, Mayu, said when coming to his house. This being the first time seeing each other since graduating high school, she grew up a bit but... Her big boobs haven't changed. Having work the next day and finding her a nuisance, Takahiro who was set on having her leave tells her “If you let me grope your boobs, I'll let you stay.” Even with a red face, she surprisingly replied with OK... The reply was unexpected but thinking once he groped her a little she'd definitely leave, so Takahiro came from behind... Gently rubbing Mayu's large boobs. Mayu gradually let's out sweet moans and climaxes once her nipples are caressed. Mayu has acquired her right to stay for “today.” However, from tomorrow she doesn't have a place to stay. In order to stay at Takahiro's house for longer, their actions go into overtime."},"links":{"al":"151296","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/dp/B092RX3VK2?binding=kindle_edition\u0026ref=dbs_dp_rwt_sb_pc_tukn","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/633463/A002569942/","engtl":"https://comics.inkr.com/title/1389-you-can-grope-it-if-only-10-times-seeing-the-unexpectedly-pleased-face-of-a-childhood-friend-without-thinking-turns-into-full-on-sex?utm_source=mgd","mu":"w647i64","raw":"https://mmr.jp/comics/22542"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"pornographic","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

After growing up poor and enduring a difficult childhood, she discovers that she is a princess of the Ates empire. However, her estranged father and half-siblings give her the cold shoulder when she moves into the palace, and Blondina must keep a low profile. That all changes when she befriends Amon, a cat-like creature with mysterious intentions. For years, creatures like Amon and humans have struggled to live in harmony. Can Blondina and Amon’s friendship bring peace, or will it deepen the rift between their people?\n\n---\nBlondina, a princess who had commoner’s blood, lived quietly in a separate palace. Due to her mixed blood, she received ill-treatment and was surrounded with contempt. One day, she happened upon a wounded black cat and decided to treat it. But, the lovely cat she assumed it to be was actually…?\n\n“If you run away like that, of course, I’d want to hunt you.”\n\nAmon’s lips gently wandered down her skin.\n\n“You’re the one who picked me up. You’re the one who kept me by your side,” Amon whispered, as his feverish breath made her skin crawl, “So you have to take responsibility for me till the end, Bridey.”\n\nOnce the lovely cat was all grown up, she realized… She thought she raised him well, but she's going to be eaten up as well.\n\n---\n[Original Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=761104)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.webtoons.com/en/romance/my-gently-raised-beast/list?title_no=2606)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/wodeyemanmengyou/list?title_no=1576)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/mycutefriend/list?title_no=2441)\n* [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/romance/j-ai-eleve-une-bete/list?title_no=2514)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.webtoons.com/de/romance/my-gently-raised-beast/list?title_no=2949)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romantic-fantasy/i-raised-a-beast/list?title_no=2422)\n* [Spanish / Español](https://www.webtoons.com/es/romance/my-gently-raised-beast/list?title_no=3105)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romantic-fantasy/i-raised-a-beast/list?title_no=2452)\n\n**Links:**\n* [Promotional Video](https://youtu.be/DqozLjc2Cn4)\n* [Original Web Novel](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=761104)","es":"Blondina vive la historia de Cenicienta en carne propia. 6ad2b360-480a-495f-84be-ad5262c2fd67:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"6ad2b360-480a-495f-84be-ad5262c2fd67","title":{"en":"A Comic Artist’s Survival Guide"},"altTitles":[{"zh-ro":"Manhuajia de Shengcun Zhinan"},{"zh":"漫画家生存指南"}],"lastChapter":"28","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en","fr"],"description":{"en":"Snow, a failing comic artist whose comic is about to be discontinued, reincarnates into his own comic by chance. He would always be relieved to see Kiku returning to him… until it all started over again in the next round of argument. For Kiku, it was Tokiwa’s “forever teasing attitude” towards her that turned her off. But she would easily melted away and “forgive” him whenever he showed even small signs of tendency towards her. село Коноха. Огромната мечта на същия този Наруто е да приеме званието на историческия герой Хокаге и да стане нинджа, като надмине всички предишни Хокаге. Ала около раждането на Наруто изглежда витае една тайна...!?","cs":"Stát se nejlepším nindžou na světě není věc snadná, dokonce ani když nejste obecně zatracovaný outsider, který má v sobě zapečetěného devítiocasého démona, jenž kdysi málem srovnal se zemí celou nindžovskou vesnici. Naruto je však pevně odhodlaný splnit si tento sen a vzdát se za žádných okolností nehodlá. Nejspíš proto, že neví, co to slovo znamená (a prakticky určitě ho nedokáže správně napsat).","de":"Naruto ist ein berüchtigter Tunichtgut in seinem Dorf, das fast ausschließlich aus Ninja besteht. Er liebt Nudelsuppe und spielt anderen gern Streiche. So ist es kein Wunder, dass er nicht gerade beliebt ist. Doch gerade deshalb will er der beste Ninja seines Dorfes werden. Zu diesem Zweck gehen er und seine Mitschüler Sasuke und Sakura beim großen Meister Kakashi in die Lehre...","en":"Before Naruto's birth, a great demon fox had attacked the Hidden Leaf Village. The 4th Hokage from the leaf village sealed the demon inside the newly born Naruto, causing him to unknowingly grow up detested by his fellow villagers. Despite his lack of talent in many areas of ninjutsu, Naruto strives for only one goal: to gain the title of Hokage, the strongest ninja in his village. Desiring the respect he never received, Naruto works toward his dream with fellow friends Sasuke and Sakura and mentor Kakashi as they go through many trials and battles that come with being a ninja.  \n\n\n---","es":"En la Villa Oculta de la Hoja, un chaval de lo más problemático que estudia en la escuela de ninjas, Naruto, se dedica a urdir gamberrada tras gamberrada. El sueño de Naruto es el de llegar un día a heredar el nombre de Hokage, reservado a los grandes héroes, y de convertirse en el mejor ninja de todos los tiempos. ¿¡Podrá Naruto llegar a cumplir sus anhelos de grandeza...!?\n\n---\nLa aldea escondida entre las hojas está habitada principalmente por ninjas, y entre ellos uno se destaca por sobre todos los demás por ser el más desobediente y quilombero: ¡¡Naruto Uzumaki!! El sueño de Naruto es convertirse en el hokage, el líder de los ninjas, y que todos reconozcan su fuerza; pero el secreto de su verdadero origen puede que sea demasiado difícil de superar.","fi":"Konohan ninjakylässä ilman vanhempia varttunut Naruto Uzumaki on ninjakoulun heikoimpia oppilaita. Mutta Narutossa piilee voimia, jotka ylittävät inhimilliset rajat... Naruto on vauhdikas seikkailutarina ninjanuorukaisesta ja hänen ystävistään, taisteluista, toveruudesta ja kunniasta. Sekä kotimaassaan että ulkomailla huippusuosittu sarja pohjautuu taruihin Japanin historian mystisistä ninjasotureista. \n\nSarjakuva etenee takakannesta etukanteen ja oikealta vasemmalle. Suositellaan yli 12-vuotiaille.","fr":"Naruto est un garçon un peu spécial. Il est toujours tout seul et son caractère fougueux ne l'aide pas vraiment à se faire apprécier dans son village. Malgré cela, il garde au fond de lui une ambition: celle de devenir un maître Hokage, la plus haute distinction dans l'ordre des ninjas, et ainsi obtenir la reconnaissance de ses pairs.","id":"Ini adalah Desa Konohagakure... Naruto adalah salah satu murid di Akademi Ninja yang suka berbuat onar!! Impian Naruto adalah menjadi seorang Hokage. Tetapi, Naruto memiliki rahasia sejak lahir karena di dalam tubuhnya terdapat siluman rubah yang disegel! Inilah petualangan Naruto untuk mewujudkan impiannya...","it":"\"Naruto\" è incentrato sulle avventure di un ragazzino, Uzumaki Naruto, che vuole diventare un famoso ninja e lasciare un segno nella storia. Gli ostacoli sul suo cammino sono però molti, come le prove che dovrà sostenere e i rivali che dovrà affrontare...\n\n---\nNaruto Uzumaki è un ragazzo dodicenne del Villaggio della Foglia che insegue il sogno di diventare Hokage, cioè il ninja più forte, nonché capo del villaggio. Il giovane custodisce in sé un segreto di cui lui stesso è all'oscuro: all'interno del suo corpo è sigillato un demone, conosciuto come Volpe a Nove Code, che attaccò il villaggio dodici anni prima e fu sigillato dal Quarto Hokage in cambio della vita. Per questo motivo, Naruto è stato sempre associato allo spirito demoniaco ed è cresciuto isolato da tutti. Dopo l'ennesima bocciatura di Naruto all'esame dell'accademia per il diploma di Genin, il suo maestro Iruka Umino lo salva dal maestro traditore Mizuki che lo aveva spinto a rubare un rotolo contenente delle tecniche proibite. In questo frangente, Naruto scopre finalmente il suo segreto. Questo, unito al desiderio di salvare Iruka, gli dà la spinta necessaria a sconfiggere Mizuki con la Tecnica Superiore della Moltiplicazione del Corpo, appresa dal rotolo. Grazie a questa dimostrazione di coraggio, il ragazzo riesce a guadagnarsi la promozione a Genin ed entra a far parte della Squadra 7 insieme a Sakura Haruno e Sasuke Uchiha, sotto la guida del maestro Kakashi Hatake.","ja":"ここは木ノ葉隠れの里。忍術学校の問題児、ナルトは今日もイタズラ三昧！！　そんなナルトのでっかい夢は歴代の勇者、火影の名を受けついで、先代を越える忍者になることだ。だがナルトには出生の秘密が…！？","pl":"Osada Konoha-gakure. Naruto, uczeń szkoły dla ninja, rozrabia jak tylko potrafi! Mimo to, jego marzeniem jest pokonanie \"Hokage\", czyli aktualnego przywódcy wojowników. Gdy Naruto się rodził, wydarzyło się coś, o czym on sam wciąż jeszcze nie wie...","pt":"La aldea escondida entre las hojas está habitada principalmente por ninjas, y entre ellos uno se destaca por sobre todos los demás por ser el más desobediente y quilombero: ¡¡Naruto Uzumaki!! El sueño de Naruto es convertirse en el hokage, el líder de los ninjas, y que todos reconozcan su fuerza; pero el secreto de su verdadero origen puede que sea demasiado difícil de superar.","ru":"Двенадцать лет назад, мощный Девятихвостый Демон-Лис напал на деревню ниндзя, Коноху. Демон был быстро побежден и запечатан в младенце по имени Наруто Узумаки. Но для этого, главному ниндзя Конохи, четвёртому хокаге пришлось пожертвовать жизнью… Теперь, по прошествии 12-и лет, Наруто является номером один среди придурков ниндзя, который полон решимости стать следующим Хокаге и получить признание всех, кто когда-либо сомневался в нем!","sr":"Jedan od najpopularnijih naslova širom sveta sada je konačno dostupan i domaćim čitaocima. Serijal prati avanture dečaka Naruta, koji pokušava da postane veliki ratnik i nadmaši sve prethodnike. Ali moraće najpre da se bori sa samim sobom.","tr":"Naruto, ünlü mangaka Masaşi Kişimoto tarafından yaratılan, 1999 yılından beri Japonya’da yayınlanan dünyaca ünlü manga serisi artık Türkiye’de.\n\nBugüne kadar Japonya’da 100 milyondan fazla satan Naruto serisi, 2002 yılında bu başarısı taçlandırarak animeye uyarlandı. Ülkemizde de gösterilen bu anime, manga kültürünü dünyaya tanıtıp; Naruto’yu dünyadaki en önemli mangalardan biri haline getirdi. Yıllardan beri geniş bir hayran kitlesi tarafından Türkçe’de yayınlanması beklenen bu eser, manganın özünden hiçbir şey kaybetmemesine özen gösterilerek ve Japonya’da olduğu gibi sağdan sola okunacak biçimde hazırlandı. Yediden yetmişe herkese hitap eden Naruto, çizgi roman kültürü ile ilgili olmayanların bile severek okuyabileceği bir eser.","uk":"Дванадцять років тому, потужний Дев'ятихвостий Демон-Лис напав на селище Коноху. Демон був швидко переможений і запечатаний в дитинку на ім'я Наруто Узумакі. Але для цього, головному ніндзя Конохи, четвертому хокаге довелося пожертвувати життям... Тепер, після 12-и років, Наруто є номером один серед ніндзя, який сповнений рішучості стати наступним Хокаґе та отримати визнання всіх, хто коли-небудь сумнівався в ньому!"},"links":{"al":"30011","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B07571D6J4/","ap":"naruto","bw":"series/13003","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/132083/","engtl":"https://www.viz.com/naruto","kt":"35","mal":"11","mu":"15","raw":"https://shonenjumpplus.com/episode/10833519556325021854"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"489dd859-9b61-4c37-af75-5b18e88daafc","name":{"en":"Ninja"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"799c202e-7daa-44eb-9cf7-8a3c0441531e","name":{"en":"Martial Arts"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}}]}

6b2f85c8-425e-4c75-9c37-feb5a7961f20:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"6b2f85c8-425e-4c75-9c37-feb5a7961f20","title":{"en":"Henai"},"altTitles":[{"en":"After-School Perversion"},{"ja-ro":"Hen-ai"},{"ja-ro":"Kyoushitsu no Yugami"},{"ja-ro":"Messiah no Yakubi"},{"en":"Messiah's Bad Day"},{"ja-ro":"Ore no Doukyuusei ga Binkan Sugite Yabai"},{"ja-ro":"Ore no Doukyuusei ga Kagen wo Shiranakute Tsurai"},{"en":"Strange Love"},{"ja":"Tomari Ki"},{"ja":"変愛"}],"lastChapter":"7","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"relatedIdds":["0a1f22fd-81e0-4358-8ff2-d24e9a0d93ea","89ee52b5-62af-4ed5-8138-5141dcc930b4","a3cc0705-004f-46c5-8f32-2a2b1f6761d1","ef302b6f-bfcd-41e5-beb3-8940707d72c5"],"description":{"en":"1: Hen Ai  \nA oneshot that describes the \"strange love\" the two main characters share. Während ihre Geschwister talentiert und wunderschön sind, wurde die arme Sylvia als fett und hässlich bezeichnet, mit einer berüchtigt schlechten Persönlichkeit obendrein. Sich daneben zu benehmen, um die Aufmerksamkeit ihres kalten Vaters zu bekommen, hat nur dazu geführt, dass sie von zu Hause verbannt wurde und ihr Leben in Verzweiflung endete. Aber als die neue „Sylvia“ fünf Jahre vor ihrem Tod aufwacht, könnte sie sich kaum weniger für die abfälligen Meinungen der anderen interessieren – sie wird dieses Leben auf ihre Weise leben! In einer Welt voller Dämonen und Diebe muss sie alle verfügbaren Ressourcen nutzen und sich darauf vorbereiten, alleine zu überleben. Sobald sie so weit ist, wird sie sich von ihrer Familien und den Fieslingen verabschieden ... also warum fangen plötzlich alle Leute, die sich vorher nie um sie gekümmert haben, an, sich für sie zu interessieren?\r\n\r\n---\r\n**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/53601030), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8039386)\r\n\r\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%AA%BB%EB%82%9C%EC%9D%B4-%EA%B3%B5%EB%85%80%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%98%EC%97%88%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2448), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56148134)\r\n\r\n**Official Translations:**\r\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/i-woke-up-as-ugly-duckling)\r\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc29306?from=manga_index)\r\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E9%86%9C%E5%85%AB%E6%80%AA%E5%8D%83%E9%87%91%E7%9A%84%E5%8F%8D%E6%93%8A/197)\r\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/i-woke-up-as-ugly-duckling-fr)\r\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/i-woke-up-as-ugly-duckling-de)\r\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/I-Became-an-Ugly-Lady/161)\r\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/67447)\r\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B7%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%89%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%81/129)","en":"Of all things, I possessed an ugly noble lady.\r\n\r\nFor the sake of receiving the attention of those who despised her, Sylvia Atlante, in the midst of all the ridicule and disrespect, made herself known as the “ugly lady”. However, one day, I happened to possess Sylvia’s body, who drank poison and ended her own life. I didn’t want to live like her.\r\n\r\n“I’m rich and healthy, so why do I need to care about other people? This is my life, I’m going to live as I want!”\r\n\r\nI just wanted to live a quiet life, but…\r\n\r\n“Still, you’re my little sister, and you’re part of the Atlante family.”\r\n\r\nThe family’s a little strange.\r\n\r\n“I’m interested in you, not your younger sister.”\r\n\r\n“You must take responsibility for this body until the end. That’s the job of the contractor.”\r\n\r\n“I, Theve Hiddleton, swear to be the sword of Sylvia Atlante and devote everything to her.”\r\n\r\n“I won’t bother you. So please, keep me by your side!”\r\n\r\n“There’s nothing in this world I can’t find. So don’t even try to run away from me.”\r\n\r\nThe handsome guys who I thought I’d never get involved with stuck around. What’s wrong with everyone? Isn’t this too different from Sylvia’s memory? I just wanted to live a peaceful life?!\r\n\r\n---\r\nWhat good is being reborn as the duke's daughter when you're the shame of the family? While her siblings were talented and beautiful, poor Sylvia was called fat and ugly, with a rumored bad personality to boot. Acting out for her cold father's attention only got her exiled from home and made her take her own life. But when the new \"Sylvia\" wakes up five years before her death, she could care less about the snarky opinions of others–she'll live this life her own way. In a world crawling with demons and thieves, she must use all the resources at her fingertips and prepare to survive on her own. Once she does, it's goodbye to her family and the naysayers... so why are the people who never cared about her before starting to take an interest in her?\r\n\r\n---\r\n**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/53601030), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8039386)\r\n\r\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%AA%BB%EB%82%9C%EC%9D%B4-%EA%B3%B5%EB%85%80%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%98%EC%97%88%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2448), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56148134)\r\n\r\n**Official Translations:**\r\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/i-woke-up-as-ugly-duckling)\r\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc29306?from=manga_index)\r\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E9%86%9C%E5%85%AB%E6%80%AA%E5%8D%83%E9%87%91%E7%9A%84%E5%8F%8D%E6%93%8A/197)\r\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/i-woke-up-as-ugly-duckling-fr)\r\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/i-woke-up-as-ugly-duckling-de)\r\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/I-Became-an-Ugly-Lady/161)\r\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/67447)\r\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B7%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%89%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%81/129)","fr":"Quel intérêt de me réincarner dans le corps de la fille du duc si c'est pour que tout le monde me déteste?! Tandis que ses frères et sœurs étaient adorés de tous pour leur beauté et leur gentillesse, Sylvia, elle, subissait de lourdes moqueries à cause de son apparence et des rumeurs sur son affreuse personnalité. Après avoir tenté plus d'une fois d'obtenir l'attention de son père, elle a fini par ne s'attirer que des problèmes et s'ôter la vie par désespoir... Et me voilà maintenant dans son corps, cinq ans avant ce tragique incident, et je ne compte pas laisser la situation telle quelle. Je me fiche de ce que pensent les autres, je compte bien me faire une place dans ce monde rempli de difficultés, de dangers et de magie. Maintenant, j'aimerais juste savoir pourquoi, alors que je ne cherche plus à avoir l'attention de qui que ce soit, tout le monde semble soudainement s'intéresser à Sylvia...?\r\n\r\n---\r\n**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/53601030), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8039386)\r\n\r\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%AA%BB%EB%82%9C%EC%9D%B4-%EA%B3%B5%EB%85%80%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%98%EC%97%88%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2448), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56148134)\r\n\r\n**Official Translations:**\r\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/i-woke-up-as-ugly-duckling)\r\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc29306?from=manga_index)\r\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E9%86%9C%E5%85%AB%E6%80%AA%E5%8D%83%E9%87%91%E7%9A%84%E5%8F%8D%E6%93%8A/197)\r\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/i-woke-up-as-ugly-duckling-fr)\r\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/i-woke-up-as-ugly-duckling-de)\r\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/I-Became-an-Ugly-Lady/161)\r\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/67447)\r\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B7%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%89%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%81/129)","tr":"Her şeyden önce çirkin, asil bir bayanın bedenine reenkarne oldum.\r\n\r\nOnu küçümseyenlerin dikkatini çekmek uğruna Sylvia Atlante, tüm alay ve saygısızlığın ortasında kendisini “çirkin leydin” olarak tanıttı.\r\n\r\nAncak bir gün, zehir içen ve kendi hayatına son veren Sylvia’nın vücuduna reenkarne oldum. Lakin onun gibi yaşamak istemiyordum.\r\n\r\n“Zengin ve sağlıklıyım, öyleyse neden diğer insanları önemsemem gerekiyor? Bu benim hayatım, istediğim gibi yaşayacağım!”\r\n\r\nSadece sessiz bir hayat yaşamak istemiştim fakat…\r\n\r\nYine de, sen benim küçük kardeşimsin ve sen Atlante ailesinin bir parçasısın.\r\n\r\nBu aile biraz tuhaf.\r\n\r\n“Seninle ilgileniyorum, küçük kız kardeşinle değil.”\r\n\r\n“Sonuna kadar bu bedenin sorumluluğunu almalısın. Yüklenicinin işi bu.”\r\n\r\n“Ben, Theve Hiddleton, Sylvia Atlante’nin kılıcı olmaya yemin ederim ve her şeyi ona adıyorum.”\r\n\r\n“Sizi hiçbir zaman rahatsız etmeyeceğim. Bu yüzden lütfen beni yanınızda tutun!”\r\n\r\n“Bu dünyada bulamadığım hiçbir şey yok. Dolayısıyla sakın benden kaçayım bile deme”\r\n\r\nAsla temas halinde bulunamayacağımı düşündüğüm yakışıklı adamlar etrafımda dönüp duruyorlar.\r\n\r\nHerkesin nesi var böyle? Bu Sylvia’nın yaşadıklarından çok farklı değil mi? Yoksa sadece huzurlu bir hayat yaşamak istediğim için olabilir mi?!\r\n\r\n---\r\n**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/53601030), [Naver Man sollte meinen, dass es schlimmere Schicksale geben könnte, doch das Problem ist, dass der Kaiser durch einen Fluch mit einem ständigen Blutrausch versehen ist und dafür bekannt ist, seine Konkubinen zu töten. Die Zukunft sieht düster aus: ein unausweichlicher Tod für Bayan und endloser Wahnsinn für den Kaiser. Considered worthless because she doesn’t have the ability to heal others, Bayan is sent to the court of Dhan, the Great Sun Emperor, who is cursed with unrelenting bloodlust and slaughters his concubines mercilessly. It seems that Bayan’s fate is sealed the moment she reaches the emperor’s palace and Dhan is fated to suffer from madness forever… But together, Bayan and Dhan just might be able to change each other’s destiny.\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/50741989), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=3544305)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%83%9C%EC%96%91%EC%9D%98-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%B8/2519), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/55872683)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.lezhin.com/en/comic/elixir)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9767/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/romance/elixir-of-the-sun/list?title_no=3769)\n* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_0000407)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.webtoons.com/de/romance/ruler-over-the-sun/list?title_no=4732)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Elixir-of-the-Sun/149)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/73502)\n* [Portuguese / Português](https://br.comikey.com/comics/o-elixir-do-sol-webtoon/427/)\n* [Russian / Ру́сский](https://moykomiks.com/series/532870/)\n* [Spanish / Español](https://www.webtoons.com/es/romance/elixir-of-the-sun/list?title_no=4245)\n* Thai / ภาษาไทย: [LINE](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romantic-fantasy/elixir-of-the-sun/list?title_no=4753), [WeComics](https://www.wecomics.in.th/comics/15225/%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B4)\n* [Vietnamese / Tiếng Việt](https://pops.tv/comics/chu-nhan-cua-mat-troi-614daed9556bc80057f0a145)","es":"Una marginada y un emperador maldito... una pareja destinada al sufrimiento y la locura, ¿no? Tal vez sea todo lo contrario. Bayan es una marginada entre los Siyo, un pueblo que tiene poderes curativos. Sin la capacidad de curar a otros, Bayan es considerada inútil y la envían a la corte de Dhan, el Gran Emperador del Sol. No suena tan mal, ¿no? El problema es que Dhan está maldecido con una perpetua sed de sangre y es conocido por masacrar a sus concubinas. El futuro parece oscuro: una muerte inevitable para Bayan y una locura interminable para Dhan. Bueno... el destino no está escrito en piedra.\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/50741989), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=3544305)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%83%9C%EC%96%91%EC%9D%98-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%B8/2519), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/55872683)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.lezhin.com/en/comic/elixir)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9767/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/romance/elixir-of-the-sun/list?title_no=3769)\n* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_0000407)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.webtoons.com/de/romance/ruler-over-the-sun/list?title_no=4732)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Elixir-of-the-Sun/149)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/73502)\n* [Portuguese / Português](https://br.comikey.com/comics/o-elixir-do-sol-webtoon/427/)\n* [Russian / Ру́сский](https://moykomiks.com/series/532870/)\n* [Spanish / Español](https://www.webtoons.com/es/romance/elixir-of-the-sun/list?title_no=4245)\n* Thai / ภาษาไทย: [LINE](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romantic-fantasy/elixir-of-the-sun/list?title_no=4753), [WeComics](https://www.wecomics.in.th/comics/15225/%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B4)\n* [Vietnamese / Tiếng Việt](https://pops.tv/comics/chu-nhan-cua-mat-troi-614daed9556bc80057f0a145)","fr":"Elle est issue d’une grande famille de guérisseurs et pourtant elle est incapable de soigner quiconque. Moquée par les autres, elle veut fuir ce destin tragique et aider sa mère malade. Elle ne pensait pas que tout basculerait lorsque l’empereur annonce qu’il cherche une nouvelle concubine pour remplacer l’ancienne qu’il a tué!\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/50741989), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=3544305)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%83%9C%EC%96%91%EC%9D%98-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%B8/2519), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/55872683)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.lezhin.com/en/comic/elixir)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9767/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/romance/elixir-of-the-sun/list?title_no=3769)\n* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_0000407)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.webtoons.com/de/romance/ruler-over-the-sun/list?title_no=4732)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Elixir-of-the-Sun/149)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/73502)\n* [Portuguese / Português](https://br.comikey.com/comics/o-elixir-do-sol-webtoon/427/)\n* [Russian / Ру́сский](https://moykomiks.com/series/532870/)\n* [Spanish / Español](https://www.webtoons.com/es/romance/elixir-of-the-sun/list?title_no=4245)\n* Thai / ภาษาไทย: [LINE](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romantic-fantasy/elixir-of-the-sun/list?title_no=4753), [WeComics](https://www.wecomics.in.th/comics/15225/%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B4)\n* [Vietnamese / Tiếng Việt](https://pops.tv/comics/chu-nhan-cua-mat-troi-614daed9556bc80057f0a145)","id":"Bayan adalah sosok wanita yang berasal dari suku Siyo, namun dia dikucilkan oleh suku Siyo di desanya karena ia tidak memiliki kemampuan penyembuhan. Hal itu diperjelas dengan warna rambutnya yang hitam, berbeda dengan warna rambut yang menjadi ciri khas suku Siyo, yaitu warna perak. Karena dianggap tidak berharga, aneh, serta berbeda dengan suku Siyo lainnya, Bayan dikirimkan ke istana kekaisaran untuk dijadikan selir kaisar. Namun, kaisar tersebut telah dikutuk untuk merasakan haus akan darah yang tiada henti-hentinya, sehingga ia sering membantai para selirnya tanpa ampun. Bayan yang tidak punya kemampuan penyembuhan dan sang kaisar, Dhan, yang telah mendapat kutukan dan ditakdirkan menjadi gila. Jika mereka bersama, bisakah mereka mengubah takdir satu sama lain?\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/50741989), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=3544305)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%83%9C%EC%96%91%EC%9D%98-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%B8/2519), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/55872683)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.lezhin.com/en/comic/elixir)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9767/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/romance/elixir-of-the-sun/list?title_no=3769)\n* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_0000407)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.webtoons.com/de/romance/ruler-over-the-sun/list?title_no=4732)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Elixir-of-the-Sun/149)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/73502)\n* [Portuguese / Português](https://br.comikey.com/comics/o-elixir-do-sol-webtoon/427/)\n* [Russian / Ру́сский](https://moykomiks.com/series/532870/)\n* [Spanish / Español](https://www.webtoons.com/es/romance/elixir-of-the-sun/list?title_no=4245)\n* Thai / ภาษาไทย: [LINE](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romantic-fantasy/elixir-of-the-sun/list?title_no=4753), [WeComics](https://www.wecomics.in.th/comics/15225/%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B4)\n* [Vietnamese / Tiếng Việt](https://pops.tv/comics/chu-nhan-cua-mat-troi-614daed9556bc80057f0a145)","pt-br":"“Meu sangue é a chave para me vingar do meu passado e mudar o futuro do império.”\n\nBayan é marginalizada entre os Siyos, um povo que possui poderes curativos. Considerada inútil por não conseguir curar os outros, Bayan é enviada à corte de Dhan, o Grande Imperador do Sol. Amaldiçoado com a implacável sede de sangue, o imperador massacra impiedosamente suas concubinas. Parece que o destino de Bayan é traçado no momento em que ela chega ao palácio do imperador e Dhan está fadado a sofrer de loucura para sempre... Mas juntos, Bayan e Dhan, podem mudar o destino um do outro.\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/50741989), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=3544305)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%83%9C%EC%96%91%EC%9D%98-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%B8/2519), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/55872683)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.lezhin.com/en/comic/elixir)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9767/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/romance/elixir-of-the-sun/list?title_no=3769)\n* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_0000407)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.webtoons.com/de/romance/ruler-over-the-sun/list?title_no=4732)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Elixir-of-the-Sun/149)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/73502)\n* [Portuguese / Português](https://br.comikey.com/comics/o-elixir-do-sol-webtoon/427/)\n* [Russian / Ру́сский](https://moykomiks.com/series/532870/)\n* [Spanish / Español](https://www.webtoons.com/es/romance/elixir-of-the-sun/list?title_no=4245)\n* Thai / ภาษาไทย: [LINE](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romantic-fantasy/elixir-of-the-sun/list?title_no=4753), [WeComics](https://www.wecomics.in.th/comics/15225/%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B4)\n* [Vietnamese / Tiếng Việt](https://pops.tv/comics/chu-nhan-cua-mat-troi-614daed9556bc80057f0a145)","ru":"Это история о судьбоносной любви двух отверженных. Баян не смогла добиться признания на своей родине, так как единственная из всех не была одарена способностью исцелять – чудесным даром племени Сиё. Тан наказан божественным проклятием: он до конца жизни вынужден страдать от нескончаемой жажды.\n \n « – Я хочу, чтобы вы были моим, Ваше Величество.\n – Чего ты хочешь?..»\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** \"จักรพรรดิแทมู\" ผู้บ้าคลั่งการทำลายล้างและนองเลือด นางจึงต้องเอาชีวิตรอดและกลับมายังหมู่บ้านที่เคยอาศัยอยู่ให้ได้\n\n---\nบายัน เป็นชีโยดำที่เติบโตในหมู่บ้านคานัก ชาวชีโยมีความสามารถในการรักษาผู้อื่น แต่ชีโยดำจะไม่สามารถใช้พลังที่ตัวเองมี รักษาคนอื่นได้ หัวหน้าหมู่บ้านบังคับให้เธอเข้าไปถวายตัวให้ฝ่าบาท เพราะทุกคนรู้ดีว่าฝ่าบาทนั้นบ้าและวิปริตแค่ไหน Após isso Kouran começa a suspeitar que na verdade Shiki é o assassino, porém a gentileza dele é tão pura que a deixa confusa."},"links":{"al":"50663","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B074C82MC8/","ap":"mikado-no-shihou","bw":"series/16910","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/129457/","kt":"9723","mal":"20663","mu":"46918"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shoujo","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}}]}

But why is one of them so sleepy?  \r\n  \r\n- Beyond This Sky  \r\nA girl consoles a new student who has just come to the school.  \r\n  \r\n- Friends  \r\nTwo particular girls, one of whom just happens to be the board chairman of their school, become friends with each other.  \r\n  \r\n- My Partner  \r\n  \r\n- Princess Academy\r\n"},"links":{"al":"39479","ap":"yuri-tengoku","kt":"19013","mal":"9479","mu":"81903"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"51d83883-4103-437c-b4b1-731cb73d786c","name":{"en":"Anthology"}},{"id":"a3c67850-4684-404e-9b7f-c69850ee5da6","name":{"en":"Girls' Love"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}}]}

She lived as a slave to money as a dog of the imperial family and a tool of her commander. Under the guise of destitution, she abandoned her guilt. But what was at the end was betrayal and death.\n\nHowever, when she opened her eyes, she went back to being a new knight after six years?\n\n'I'm not going to be a swordsman for money anymore!'\n\nIn front of Judith, who is determined to live a different life than before, the commander of the Red Knights and scouts appears...\n\n\"I assure you that you will be treated fairly. Why don't you join the Red Knights?\"\n\nJudith decided not to pursue money blindly as a Red Knight, abandoning her past of being a Black Knight. Can she live this life without regret?\n\n---\nAfter dying at the hands of her backstabbing superior, money-grubbing Judith learned the hard way that bounty is never worth bloodshed. When she somehow finds herself alive and well, six years prior to her death, she decides to use her second chance at life to abandon her greed and become a genuine knight. She begins by accepting Captain Kaillou Lewalmeigh's offer to join the honorable Order of Red Knights. Elle est décidée à vivre une autre vie.\n\nEt une opportunité se présente à elle quand le commandant des chevaliers rouges apparaît.\n\n---\nLe chevalier impérial Judith était autrefois une ordure prête à tout pour de l'argent. Elle vivait comme une esclave de l'argent, comme un chien de la famille impériale et un outil du chef. Sous couvert de dénuement, elle a abandonné sa culpabilité. Mais à la fin, elle n'a connu que la trahison et la mort. Pourquoi ne rejoignez-vous pas les Chevaliers rouges?»\n\nJudith a décidé de ne pas poursuivre aveuglément l'argent en tant que chevalier rouge, abandonnant son passé de chevalier noir. 6cebf5a9-9f63-4f90-b2fc-4f9026aba184:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"6cebf5a9-9f63-4f90-b2fc-4f9026aba184","title":{"en":"Mach SOS"},"altTitles":[{"ja-ro":"Mahha SOS"},{"ja":"マッハSOS"}],"lastChapter":"24","description":{"en":"This work, which has been serialized in ``Boken Ou'' since 1977, incorporates elements of aircraft comics into boy action. It is a work. The author is Gosaku Sakurata, who had a wide range of serials from girls' comics to graphic novels at the time. Since the mid-1970s, as a member of Dynamic Pro, he has been in charge of comicalization of numerous robot animations such as \"Mazinger Z\", \"Great Mazinger\", and \"UFO Robo Grendizer\". In the work, Mach Squad, which freely controls cool jet planes and follows strict orders that do not seem to be \"friends of justice\" under the name of \"for peace\". The ability to draw such anguish with a pen touch that touches the heart is cultivated through his rich writing history. 6cfc0541-41e2-4f77-8340-971fdc15bacc:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"6cfc0541-41e2-4f77-8340-971fdc15bacc","title":{"en":"Into the Light, Once Again"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"다시 한 번, 빛속으로"},{"ko-ro":"Dasi Han Beon, Bin Sogeuro"},{"en":"Once Again, Into the Light"},{"en":"Once Again Into the Light, Alone"},{"en":"Once Again Into the Light"},{"fr":"Into the Light Once Again"},{"fr":"Encore une fois sous la lumière"},{"it":"Ritorno alla luce"},{"pt":"Mais uma vez até a luz"},{"ru":"Ещё раз в свет"},{"th":"องค์หญิงผู้หวนคืนสู่แสงสว่าง"},{"ja":"もう一度、光の中へ"},{"zh":"再次遇见光明"},{"zh":"再见光明"},{"zh-hk":"重迎曙光"},{"zh-hk":"遇光重生"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en","uk","it","id","pl"],"description":{"en":"I was falsely accused of attempting to kill my younger sister, who was worshipped as a holy maiden. There was not a single person who believed in me, nor was there a person who stood up for me. Not even my blood-related family. I was fourteen years old, and it was winter. I, who was Edenbell's Fourth Princess, was miserably beheaded in front of the masses. After the end of my death, I awoke and what came was...\n\n\"My baby, my precious younger sister.\"\n\nWith a delightful smile, he held my small fingers. That warm gesture, warmth, and touch. He sang me a lullaby as he held me gently and swayed.\n\n---\nWhen Princess Alisa is framed for a terrible crime, she is shocked to learn that her own family wants her executed. After losing her will to live, she finds herself reborn as the princess of a rival empire. And though her new family acts sweet and kind on the surface, she's not sure they can be truly trusted. Luckily, with this new life comes new power. But what exactly is this mysterious magic that awakens in her? And more importantly, can she use it to get vengeance against those who once betrayed her?\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/52524734)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8B%A4%EC%8B%9C-%ED%95%9C%EB%B2%88-%EB%B9%9B-%EC%86%8D%EC%9C%BC%EB%A1%9C/2586), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57770713)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/into-the-light-once-again/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com?contentId=146)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E9%87%8D%E8%BF%8E%E6%9B%99%E5%85%89/209)\n* [French / Français](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/225)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Into-the-Light-Once-Again/51)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/83347)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%84%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%8D%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%B7%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%88%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%A7%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87/249)","fr":"Alyssa, la quatrième princesse d’Edenbell, est accusée à tort d’avoir tenté de tuer sa petite sœur. Condamnée froidement à mort par sa famille, elle se réincarne comme princesse de l’empire rival, Elmir. Dégoutée par la trahison de ses proches, elle jure de ne plus jamais aimer qui que ce soit. Mais l’empire d’Elmir est bien différent de celui d’Edenbell… Dans ce nouvel environnement, parviendra-t-elle à retrouver foi en l'humanité et à découvrir les terribles secrets qui entourent son exécution?\n\n---\nPersonne n’a cru en moi, personne n’était là pour me soutenir, même ma propre famille. A ce moment-là, j’étais Alyssa, 4e princesse d’Edenbell. J’étais dans un état épouvantable et j’avais la gorge asséchée par la soif. J’ai regardé ma sœur cadette, espérant qu’elle les empêcherait de me tuer. Mais ce que j’ai vu sur son visage, c’était une expression d’extase, elle était heureuse d’assister à ma mort. Après avoir été exécutée, j’ai ouvert de nouveau mes yeux. J’étais dans le ventre de quelqu’un et je pouvais entendre des voix. Avant de retomber dans l’inconscience, j’ai entendues les paroles d’un petit garçon:\n\n«Bienvenue, ma précieuse petite sœur,» il a ri chaleureusement, «Le monde entier t’aime.»\n\nJe me suis réincarnée en tant que première princesse de l’empire Elmir, le rival de l’empire Edenbell!\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/52524734)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8B%A4%EC%8B%9C-%ED%95%9C%EB%B2%88-%EB%B9%9B-%EC%86%8D%EC%9C%BC%EB%A1%9C/2586), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57770713)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/into-the-light-once-again/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://pdt.tencentac.com?contentId=146)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E9%87%8D%E8%BF%8E%E6%9B%99%E5%85%89/209)\n* [French / Français](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/225)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Into-the-Light-Once-Again/51)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/83347)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%84%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%8D%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%B7%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%88%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%A7%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87/249)","id":"Aku dituduh mau membunuh adikku sendiri yang mendapat julukan sebagai saintess. Setelah kehidupan pertamaku berakhir, saat aku membuka mata... \"Sayang, adikku yang manis.\" Ada yang memanggilku dengan hangat. Dia memegang tanganku yang mungil sambil tersenyum. 6d0e02e9-69be-4cc2-bbae-01a6256aa360:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"6d0e02e9-69be-4cc2-bbae-01a6256aa360","title":{"en":"1 2 no Sanshirou 2"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"１・２の三四郎2"},{"ja-ro":"1 2 no Sanshirō 2"},{"zh-hk":"1·2三四郎2"},{"th":"ซันชิโร่คืนถิ่น"}],"lastChapter":"6","relatedIdds":["1042d1a1-f332-4381-bac6-0b5580310be5","f6a8649a-3997-48b0-a6ba-38b72142e84c"],"description":{"en":"Sanshiro Higashi , a professional wrestler who returned to Japan after completing three years of overseas warrior training , retired because his affiliated group, Shinto Pro, was disbanded during that time, and worked as a manager at a family restaurant.\n\nTwo years later. Sanshiro's ex-colleague, wrestler Shin Gozu, appears at Sanshiro's shop . After breaking both of his knees and being fired from the organization he founded, FTO (unrelated to the real professional wrestling organization Pro Wrestling FTO ), he decided to start a new organization and became its ace. She came to beg Sanshirō for his return. But Sanshirō stubbornly refused to shake his head.\n\nLater, Sanshiro becomes concerned about the Gozu, goes to Korakuen Hall to watch the \"Dream Team\" launch match, and sees the Gozu's helpless appearance.\n\nShinto Pro, which was once a major power, collapsed, and the Japanese professional wrestling world entered the Warring States period with 16 groups. Among them, FTO, led by Gozu, who was No. 1 in terms of popularity and ability, was steadily increasing the number of customers. Pro wrestling is a show that deceives children,\" and the five heads also argued, \"Pro wrestling can be enjoyed by both adults and children,\" and did not yield to each other's claims. In this way, a one-on-one battle of the generational struggle was performed, and the five heads were devastated in front of Akagi and suffered a complete defeat with 5 losses and 5 losses, and both knees were broken.\n\nSanshiro's heart is shaken by Akagi's remarks that deny their professional wrestling, and the \"fighting spirit\" ignites. Sanshirō, who prides himself on being the strongest, shows his will to return.\n\nA new fighting spirit legend of the strongest professional wrestler Higashi Sanshiro was about to begin.","ja":"[Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/1%E3%83%BB2%E3%81%AE%E4%B8%89%E5%9B%9B%E9%83%8E_2)","th":"[Wikipedia](https://th.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E0%B8%8B%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B4%E0%B9%82%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%B7%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%96%E0%B8%B4%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%99)"},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/dp/B074CG3W51?binding=kindle_edition\u0026ref=dbs_dp_rwt_sb_pc_tukn","bw":"series/46048/list","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/313569/","mu":"37jnkc1"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"69964a64-2f90-4d33-beeb-f3ed2875eb4c","name":{"en":"Sports"}},{"id":"799c202e-7daa-44eb-9cf7-8a3c0441531e","name":{"en":"Martial Arts"}}]}
